reviewText: This little known Anthony Quinn movie is worth a watch. The ending is poignant and moving. Well worth the price.

reviewText: I'm a Anthony Quinn fan.  I saw the movie nearly 50 years ago.  I searched for it for these 50 years and recently found it with dubbed voices (not Quinn) with English sub-titles.  I want the read product.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was expecting to see the entire original film as I had seen on regular television in the 70's.  Disappointed that some of the film had been edited out.  Still, I wish the Studio which owns this movie would release it to DVD in its entirety..
summary: The Movie is an incomplete copy.

reviewText: This is an excellent movie that could not be found until now. So if you want a perfect performance and an unusual story line this movie is for you.
summary: This is an excellent movie that could not be found until now

reviewText: the movie is very good. It is about someone with chronic bad luck, that is taking everything with a smile. Quinn is playing it admirably. It also is one of the movies that Anthony Quinn starred that I did not know existed, while I was living in Romania. Highly recommended. I hope it will be transferred on BD, I would have to buy it again. FYI: only Korean subtitles. Region 0.
